scripts.build: npm run --silent build:rollup && npm run --silent build:webextension
scripts.build:webextension: npm run --silent build:patch:manifest && npm run --silent build:patch
scripts.output: rimraf ./dist/web-ext-artifacts/ && web-ext --source-dir=./dist/webext/webextension/ build && mkdirp ./dist/publish && mv -n ./dist/web-ext-artifacts/talkie*.zip "./dist/publish/talkie-joelpurra.com-$(cd ../../ && npm run --silent version:get:head)-webextension.zip"
scripts.publish: echo '--- DISABLED ---' web-ext --source-dir=./dist/webext/webextension/ sign --id '{d83c8fb0-e51b-4d74-9c10-90e9610f16ca}' --channel listed && mv -n ./dist/web-ext-artifacts/talkie*.xpi "./dist/publish/talkie-joelpurra.com-$(cd ../../ && npm run --silent version:get:head)-webextension.xpi" && echo 'NOTE: Manually upload source code and check upload status on https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/developers/addons'
scripts.rebuild: npm run --silent clean && npm run --silent build
